game.name: Gravity Gauntlet
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound
game.shortDescription: Gravity Gauntlet is a mind-bending portal-like puzzle platformer set in the depths of a crumbling space station. Harness the power to manipulate the gravity of objects around you to solve challenging puzzles, uncover story fragments and escape impending doom.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gravity Gauntlet is a mind-bending portal-like puzzle platformer set in the depths of a crumbling space station. Harness the power to manipulate the gravity of objects around you to solve challenging puzzles, uncover story fragments and escape impending doom.
